entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
